title: Satellite images show impact of Iran missile and drone attacks on Dubai
summary_full: Following the killing of its Supreme Leader, Iran launched retaliatory strikes across the Middle East, targeting American military bases and Israel. Dubai, a symbol of modern opulence, was also hit, with iconic landmarks like the Burj Al Arab and vital infrastructure such as Dubai International Airport sustaining damage amidst widespread attacks.
